headline.main: The Alantic Cable--Letter from Capt. Hudson.

docs.lead_paragraph: BY HIS EXCELLENCY, JOHN A. KING GOVERNOR OF THE STATE OF NEW-YORK. A humble sense of our dependence on Almighty God, for all the benefits and blessings we enjoy, renders it especially proper at this time to return our thanks to the great Giver of all good for another year of plenteous harvests and general health. The promise that seed time and harvest shall never fall has

headline.main: Pursuits of Industry in Large and Crowded Cities.; Anniversary Address Before the American Institute.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Anniversary Address before the America Institute was delivered in the Crystal Palace last evening by Hon. NATHANIEL P. BANKS, of Massachusetts. A large audience was present. Mr. BANKS was introduced by Mr. WARNEY, Chairman of the Board of Managers, and spoke as follows: The year which is about to close will constitute an epoch in our industrial history.

headline.main: MARINE INTELLIGENCE.; Cleared. Arrived. Sailed. Memoranda. By Telegraph. Domostic Ports. Spoken, &c. Foreign Perts. Foreign Shipping Intelligence.
NAVAL INTELLIGENCE.; The Splendid Equipment and Condition of the Wabash.

docs.lead_paragraph: It is now two months since we anchored in this port. The British screw-line-of-battle-ship Brunswick and steam-sloop Tartar have both gone to sea, leaving us the only man-of-war in the harbor. Our ship is in the most superb order, both inside and out, and excites the admiration of all who see her. English naval officers are lavish in their praise, both of the beauty of the ship and the order in which she is kept.

headline.main: THE HARD TIMES.; The Gold Going Back to the Savings Banks---The Effect of the Revalsion on Tradesmen, &c., &c.. RECOVERING PROM THE PANIC.

docs.lead_paragraph: The old lady who thanked her stars that she had borrowed money enough to pay all her debts, did not meet her sisterhood with half so radiant a face as man yesterday met his brother man. The weather was unpropitious. In ordinary circumstances it would have given any one the blues.
